mainStyleTypeOptions.image-accordion: Expandable panels with background images (like vertical tabs)
mainStyleTypeOptions.sliding-boxes: Grid of cards that slide up/left on hover revealing content
mainStyleTypeOptions.article-box: Featured content cards with image backgrounds and text overlays
mainStyleTypeOptions.info-banner: Full-width promotional banner with split content/image layout
mainStyleTypeOptions.hover-section: Grid where hovering changes ENTIRE section background image
mainStyleTypeOptions.fancy-box: Elegant icon cards with animated separator line
mainStyleTypeOptions.services-element: Cards with expandable bullet-point feature lists
mainStyleTypeOptions.portfolio: Image grid with overlay content on hover (circular or rectangular)

serviceBoxStructure.title: Main heading
serviceBoxStructure.subTitle: Optional secondary heading (appears above title in portfolio)
serviceBoxStructure.iconType: 'icon' for FontAwesome or 'image' for custom image
serviceBoxStructure.iconStore: FontAwesome class (e.g., 'fas fa-code') or empty for iconType: image
serviceBoxStructure.imgStore: Custom image object {url: '...'} when iconType: image
serviceBoxStructure.contentList: Pipe-separated feature list for services-element: 'Feature 1 | Feature 2 | Feature 3'

iconStyleOptions.icon-square: Square icon container with rounded corners
iconStyleOptions.icon-rounded: Square with heavy border-radius (softer than square, less than circle)

whenToUseWhichStyle.image-accordion: When you have 3-5 services with distinct visuals, want interactive expansion
whenToUseWhichStyle.sliding-boxes: Standard service/feature grids, most versatile, works for any content
whenToUseWhichStyle.article-box: Blog posts, case studies, featured content with large images
whenToUseWhichStyle.info-banner: Hero CTAs, promotional sections, product announcements (single item only)
whenToUseWhichStyle.hover-section: Interactive showcases where background context changes (4-6 items max)
whenToUseWhichStyle.fancy-box: Clean, minimal feature lists with subtle animations
whenToUseWhichStyle.services-element: Detailed service packages with multiple features (pricing tables alternative)
whenToUseWhichStyle.portfolio: Project galleries, case study grids, work samples with image focus

validationRules.serviceBox: Required array, minimum 1 item (info-banner), 2-8 items recommended (other styles)
validationRules._key: Required for each serviceBox item, must be unique (0, 1, 2...)
validationRules.iconStore: Required when iconType: 'icon', empty when iconType: 'image'
validationRules.featureImg: Required for image-accordion, article-box, hover-section, portfolio
validationRules.columns: Bootstrap 12-grid, md + sm + xs recommended for responsive
validationRules.disBtn: Must be true to show buttons (default false)
validationRules.disIcnImg: Must be true to show icons/images (default false)

warnings: This is the most complex Nexter block with 8 completely different style systems
mainStyleType determines which attributes are active - many attributes are style-specific
info-banner should only have 1 item in serviceBox (it's a single banner, not repeater)
hover-section with sectionImgPreload: true downloads ALL background images upfront (use sparingly)
contentList uses pipe | separator, NOT commas (Feature 1 | Feature 2 | Feature 3)
activeSlide is 1-based for user-facing, but _key is 0-based for React
Don't mix iconType and featureImg - icons are for small graphics, featureImg is for large backgrounds
columns uses Bootstrap inverted logic: md: 4 = 3 columns (12 ÷ 4 = 3)
portfolio titleOnClick is the link text, NOT the click event

accessibilityNotes.ariaLabel: Provide descriptive labels for all CTA buttons
accessibilityNotes.altText: featureImg and imgStore should have alt attributes in WordPress media library
accessibilityNotes.semanticHTML: titleTagType defaults to h6 (can change to h2/h3 for better hierarchy)
accessibilityNotes.colorContrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for text over gradient/image backgrounds
accessibilityNotes.touchTargets: Buttons should be minimum 44×44px for mobile accessibility

performanceOptimization.imageOptimization: Use WordPress imageSize: 'large' or 'medium' instead of 'full' for faster loading
performanceOptimization.lazyLoading: Browser-native lazy loading applied to featureImg automatically
performanceOptimization.hoverSectionWarning: sectionImgPreload: true loads all images upfront - limit to 4-6 items max
performanceOptimization.responsiveImages: WordPress generates multiple sizes automatically for different breakpoints

troubleshooting.solution: Set disIcnImg: true and ensure iconStore has valid FontAwesome class
Set disBtn: true and add btnText to each serviceBox item

troubleshooting.issue: Background images not loading in hover-section
troubleshooting.solution: Set sectionImgPreload: true and ensure featureImg URLs are valid
Use pipe | separator, not commas: 'Item 1 | Item 2 | Item 3'

troubleshooting.issue: Columns showing wrong number per row
troubleshooting.solution: Remember: md: 4 = 3 columns (12 ÷ 4), use Bootstrap 12-grid math
Check imgFlexGrow value (default 7.5), ensure layoutHeight is set
